Articles.Content:
Yep, german here. 22 yrs old.

Ive joined the community some days ago, whats up?

Im playing KSP since... um... theyve added the spaceplane hangar shortly after Ive joined. Dunno when that was.

I kinda sucked at my first tries, but I think Ive got the feeling for everything.

Im playing even after 0.22 came out in the sandbox mode with a vanilla KSP. Maybe Ill change that one day.

Maybe you wanna visit my mission log? Take a look! *klick*

So far, see ya! Ill stay as long KSP is great. So... forever? hopefully?

I hope I will not get inactive once X Reborn comes out...

Welcome to the forums!

Impressive work with that LISA replica!

Feel free to make yourself at home, and don't be afraid to ask questions if you need to. You might also want to take note of the German language subforum.
